headline: Samsung Shares Surge to Record After Report on Higher Chip Price
summary: The chipmaker’s stock rose as much as 5.4% on Korea Exchange, as the market reopened following a three-day holiday.  Samsung is looking to price its HBM4 at around $700 per unit, according to Chosun Ilbo newspaper.  Samsung declined to comment on the media report.

content.title: Samsung Shares Surge to Record After Report on Higher Chip Price
content.summary: The chipmaker’s stock rose as much as 5.4% on Korea Exchange, as the market reopened following a three-day holiday.  Samsung is looking to price its HBM4 at around $700 per unit, according to Chosun Ilbo newspaper.  Samsung declined to comment on the media report.

headline: Zuckerberg Says ‘Difficult’ to Enforce Instagram Age Limits
summary: The chief executive officer of Meta Platforms Inc. was sharply questioned on the witness stand Wednesday about the company’s efforts to attract and engage teens, and whether it adequately policed accounts belonging to children under 13, despite rules barring them from using the app.  Zuckerberg said Meta has introduced some “proactive tools” to try to identify and remove accounts used by children under 13, but called it a “challenging” problem.  “There are a set of people — potentially a meaningful number of people — that lie about their age,” Zuckerberg told the jury in Los Angeles Superior Court.

content.title: Zuckerberg Says ‘Difficult’ to Enforce Instagram Age Limits
content.summary: The chief executive officer of Meta Platforms Inc. was sharply questioned on the witness stand Wednesday about the company’s efforts to attract and engage teens, and whether it adequately policed accounts belonging to children under 13, despite rules barring them from using the app.  Zuckerberg said Meta has introduced some “proactive tools” to try to identify and remove accounts used by children under 13, but called it a “challenging” problem.  “There are a set of people — potentially a meaningful number of people — that lie about their age,” Zuckerberg told the jury in Los Angeles Superior Court.

headline: Why smart glasses could be the next big gadget hit in 2026
summary: Listen and subscribe to Stocks In Translation on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever you find your favorite podcast.Smart glasses 2.0 are here - and this year they could be huge.In this episode of Stocks in Translation, BNP Paribas Equity Research Equity Analyst David O’Connor joins host Jared Blikre and Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Brooke DiPalma to discuss the booming market for AR glasses. With shipments projected to grow over 50% this year, smart glasses are finally shedding their “science project” image. O’Connor explains how next-gen features, lighter form factors, and Apple's (AAPL) AI-focused wearables could make these devices must-haves of 2026.Check out the full episode here. Twice a week, Stocks In Translation cuts through the market mayhem, noisy numbers and hyperbole to give you the information you need to make the right trade for your portfolio. You can find more episodes here, or watch on your favorite streaming service. This post was written by Lauren Pokedoff

content.title: Why smart glasses could be the next big gadget hit in 2026
content.description:
Listen and subscribe to Stocks In Translation on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever you find your favorite podcast.

Smart glasses 2.0 are here - and this year they could be huge.

In this episode of Stocks in Translation, BNP Paribas Equity Research Equity Analyst David O’Connor joins host Jared Blikre and Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Brooke DiPalma to discuss the booming market for AR glasses. With shipments projected to grow over 50% this year, smart glasses are finally shedding their “science project” image. O’Connor explains how next-gen features, lighter form factors, and Apple's (AAPL) AI-focused wearables could make these devices must-haves of 2026.

Check out the full episode here.

Twice a week, Stocks In Translation cuts through the market mayhem, noisy numbers and hyperbole to give you the information you need to make the right trade for your portfolio. You can find more episodes here, or watch on your favorite streaming service.

This post was written by Lauren Pokedoff

With shipments projected to grow over 50% this year, smart glasses are finally shedding their “science project” image.
